item.description:
This is part of the Wadsworth's summer film series, "The Best of the Fests." If you missed seeing something during one of the film festivals in the last year, here is a second chance. Many of the films are shown more than once, so if you are interested but cannot make this time, check their website for additional dates and times.

"A Matter of Size"
Sunday Jun 20, 10 2 p.m. - 3:30 p.m.
2009. Israel. 90 min. Subtitles. Not Rated.
Directed by Sharon Maymon and Erez Tadmor. Starring Itzik Cohen.

In this poignant comedy, a group of fat people from the Israeli city of Ramla, fed up with being criticized about their weight, discover the world of sumo, where the obese are honored and appreciated.


NOTE: There is another movie at 4:00pm which is set as a different Meetup. Choose one or both on this day.
item.how_to_find_us: In the lobby of Aetna Theater before the movie. I'll have a shawl.

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "A Matter of Size" @ Wadsworth Atheneum
